auth_body_welcome_login_message: Use these forms to login to your company portal for free.
auth_body_welcome_signup_message: Use these forms to create your company and your first account for free.
auth_body_welcome_forgetpassword_message: Use these forms to rest your password.
auth_signin_signup_message: Ready to start your own company?
auth_forget_password_message: You will receive a verification code on this email address.
auth_forget_password_server_down_error_m: We’re unable to complete this process right now because of a server issue. Please try again later.
auth_reset_password_wrong_current_passwo: The current password you entered is incorrect.
auth_reset_password_wrong_confirm_passwo: The confirmation password does not match the new password.
auth_reset_password_first_message: Enter your email address below. You will receive a verification code by email.
auth_reset_password_enter_verification_c: Enter the verification code you received by email.
auth_reset_password_timer_verification_c: The code will expire in {{ minutes }} minutes and {{ seconds }} seconds.
auth_forget_password_success_message: Your password has been successfully updated.
auth_signin_blocked_user_error_message: Your account is temporarily locked. Try again later or contact your manager
auth_signup_success_message: Your company and account has been successfully created.
auth_profile_expired_error_message: Oops! We couldn’t load your profile. Please sign in again.
upload_profile_picture_failed: Failed to upload your profile picture.
manage_profile_edit_profile_done: Your profile has been updated successfully.
manage_company_edit_success_message: Your company details has been successfully edited.
manage_teams_edit_team_empty_target_user: There is no users assigned to this team.
manage_teams_edit_team_empty_source_user: There is no users to assign to this team.
manage_teams_delete_team_confirm_dialog_: Deleting this team will downgrade its manager, unassign all members, and notify them (Deleting this team cannot be undone). Do you want to continue?
manage_teams_delete_team_success_deletin: Team deleted. The manager was downgraded to employee, all members were unassigned, and everyone was notified.
manage_teams_delete_team_notification_me: The team you were part of has been deleted by {{ name }} . Your manager privileges have been revoked (if any), and you are no longer assigned to any team.
manage_users_delete_user_confirm_dialog_: Are you sure you want to delete this user? Deleting this user will permanently remove all their notifications, documents, and personal details.
manage_document_upload_document_missing_: You need to select recipient before uploading the document!
manage_document_upload_file_message_fiel: Drag and drop files to here to upload.
manage_document_add_document_notificatio: {{ name }} has shared a new document with you. Check your documents list to view it.
manage_document_delete_document_dialog_m: Are you sure you want to delete this document? Deleting it will also remove the recipient’s notification.
branding_reset_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete all your personalized styles? If you confirm, the page will refresh and your company logo will not be deleted.
book_holiday_calendar_title: Pick the dates you’d like to take off — you can select several holiday periods at the same time.
book_holiday_wrong_selected_days_number_: You don’t have enough remaining days for this request
book_holiday_empty_holiday_type_error: You need to select a type first
book_holiday_select_holiday_type_message: Select the type of holiday you need
book_holiday_notification_message: {{ name }} booked a holiday. Check your holidays request list for more details
book_holiday_approved_notification_messa: {{ name }} approved your holiday request.Check your holidays request list for more details.
book_holiday_rejected_notification_messa: {{ name }} rejected your holiday request.Check your holidays request list for more details.
book_holiday_canceled_notification_messa: {{ name }} canceled his holiday request.Check your holidays request list for more details.
manage_event_event_type_list_title: Select the type of event you will create
manage_event_time_details_message: This {{ type }} is created by {{ organizerName }} at {{ at }}, it starts from {{ from }} and it ends {{ to }}
manage_event_add_event_notification_mess: {{ name }} added you to a new event. View events section for more details.
manage_event_edit_event_notification_mes: {{ name }} made changes to an event you're involved in. Check events section to review the updates.
manage_event_delete_event_dialog_message: Delete this notification? This will also remove all related notifications.
manage_event_delete_done_notification_me: {{ name }} delete an event you're involved in. View events section for more details.
settings_dialog_verification_code_length: Verification code length for password reset(maximum 6 digits)

settings_dialog_jwt_token_expire_in: JWT access token validity period (maximum 60 minutes)

settings_dialog_min_password_length: Defines the minimum number of characters required for passwords (8 characters)

input_picklist_target_header: List of users in this team
error_status_0: Your requests could not reach the server. This may be due to your internet connection or the server being unavailable.
error_status_403: You are not authorized to perform this action.
error_status_UNAUTHORIZED: This account does not exist. Please check your credentials.
error_status_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: A technical problem occurred. Please try again later.
